reviewText: loved it. gave it to my grandaughter and dvd format is perfect.it goes so great with the dvdmovie. would recommend it to all. i have not seen it but she likes it.

... especially if you enjoy Emeril and cooking. We are fans of the Food Network, and really miss Emeril Live.
Watching the video inspired me to prepare ratatouille with my son - an experience we both enjoyed. But not as much as we enjoyed the family eating our veggies together!
